title: Ask Your Neurons: A Deep Learning Approach to Visual Question Answering
abstract: We address a question answering task on real-world images that is set up as a Visual Turing Test. By combining latest advances in image representation and natural language processing, we propose Ask Your Neurons, a scalable, jointly trained, end-to-end formulation to this problem.
histories: Improved version, it also has a final table from the VQA challenge, and more baselines on DAQUAR
